mapper.select: SELECT ch.ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, CHAT_TIME, CHAT_ID, CHAT_TYPE ,EMP_ID,CHAT_CON, CHAT_TYPE FROM CHAT_ROOM cr, JSON_TABLE(ROOM_MEM, '$.ROOM[*]' COLUMNS ( IDS VARCHAR(20) PATH '$.id' ) ) AS jt, (SELECT ROOM_ID, EMP_ID ,CHAT_ID , CHAT_TIME , CHAT_TYPE, CHAT_CON, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(PARTITION BY ROOM_ID ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC) AS mx FROM CHAT ) ch WHERE IDS = #{emp_id} AND cr.ROOM_ID = ch.ROOM_ID AND mx = 1 ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, e.RANK_NO, RANK_NAME FROM CHAT_ROOM, JSON_TABLE(ROOM_MEM, '$.ROOM[*]' COLUMNS ( IDS VARCHAR(20) PATH '$.id', JDATE VARCHAR(30) PATH '$.join' ) ) AS jt, (SELECT EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, RANK_NO FROM EMP ) e, (SELECT RANK_NAME,RANK_NO FROM "RANK" ) r WHERE ROOM_ID = #{room_id} AND jt.IDS = e.EMP_ID AND e.RANK_NO = r.RANK_NO ORDER BY 3 DESC, TO_DATE(jt.JDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_ROOM SET ROOM_MEM = #{room_mem} WHERE ROOM_ID = #{room_id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CHAT.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_ID,ROOM_ID,EMP_ID,CHAT_CON,CHAT_TIME,CHAT_TYPE) VALUES (#{seq},#{room_id},#{emp_id},TO_CLOB(#{chat_con}),TO_DATE(#{chat_time},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),#{chat_type})

SELECT SEQ_CHAT_FILE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT_FILE (FILE_CHAT_ID,FILE_CHAT_UUID,FILE_CHAT_ORIGINNM, FILE_CHAT_TYPE,FILE_UPLOADPATH,ROOM_ID) VALUES (#{file_chat_id},#{file_chat_uuid},#{file_chat_originnm}, #{file_chat_type},#{file_uploadpath},#{room_id})

SELECT SEQ_CHAT_ROOM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME,ROOM_MEM) VALUES(#{seq},#{room_name},#{room_mem})
